name: My 2D Waifu is a Maniacal Mugging Mistress?!
name_original: My 2D Waifu is a Maniacal Mugging Mistress?!
description:
Full Title
First I was only curious but I seriously can't believe my 2D Waifu is really a little maniacal mugging mistress?! ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ Maximum Give Me all Your Money Edition

Instructions

Click on the Fist Icon below NPCs in order to mug them.

  • Eggplants are safe to mug and let go.
  • Boxes are suspicious and should be hit.
  • Cops are to be avoided.

Short Description
A game strictly about beating up and mugging everyone in your path.

Update:
White Vending Machines have been implemented in new build.
